name: your app name
shortDescription: short description of your app functionality
longDescription: if needed longer description, otherwise the same as short description (keep the field for correct display in the DE)
helpURI: link to documentation or github repo of the app
datePublished: this field can be left empty, will be auto filled in
author: your name
version: app version in the format 0.0.0 try to keep this the same as the docker image versioning if possible
ontology: a list of EDAM uri in the following format (max 6): http://edamontology.org/operation_0362
